caption.title: Comparison of seeds of Impatiens capensis Meerb.
caption.p: (A–D) General view of seeds from (A) Czarnocin, (B) Police, (C) Lublin, (D) Podgrodzie; (E–F) seed sculpture; (G) seed surface 3D ultrastructure between the ribs; (H) rib; (I–L) cells near rib; (M) 3D ultrastructure of cells near rib.
